entry.title: The Epicenter of Gaza Humanitarian Crisis Is This Border Town
entry.content: The U.N. warns that Rafah, on the Egyptian frontier, could soon host half of the Palestinian territory’s 2.2 million population.

entry.title: FDA Approves World's First Crispr Gene-Editing Drug for Sickle-Cell Disease
entry.content: The U.S. has approved the world’s first medicine employing Crispr technology, a Nobel Prize-winning discovery that promised a powerful new tool to treat disease.

entry.title: Pressure Ramps Up for Gaza Cease-Fire as Israel Races to Eliminate Hamas
entry.content: Israel’s accelerating campaign to destroy Hamas is driving up civilian casualties and deepening a humanitarian crisis in Gaza.
